DWLD_701.title: Download Restriction
DWLD_701.message: A maximum of 5 devices per account are permitted for the Download of Premium/VIP content. Please delete the download from the other devices. (Error: 701)

DWLD_702.title: Download Restriction
DWLD_702.message: A maximum of 5 Premium/VIP content is allowed to be downloaded simultaneously per device. Please delete an existing download on the device to proceed with this download. (Error: 702)

DWLD_703.title: Download Restriction
DWLD_703.message: A maximum of 5 contents from this studio may be downloaded simultaneously. Please delete an existing downloaded content from the same studio to proceed with this. (Error: 703)

DWLD_707.title: Download Restriction
DWLD_707.message: A maximum of 5 Premium/VIP content is allowed to be downloaded simultaneously across all devices per account. Please delete an existing downloaded content to proceed with this (Error: 707)

DWLD_711.title: Download Restriction
DWLD_711.message: This title has already been downloaded previously and hence cannot be downloaded again. All Premium/VIP content can be downloaded only once. (Error: 711)
